About¶

oceanum-python¶

Library for oceanum.io services

  • MIT license

  • Documentation: https://oceanum.readthedocs.io.

Features¶

  • Simple pythonic access to the Oceanum datamesh

Credits¶

This package was developed by Oceanum Numerical, with input from our development partners and contributors.

Development Lead¶

  • Oceanum Developers <developers@oceanum.science>

Contributors¶

Always looking for feedback and input
